name: SplitView
description: An sp-split-view element delivers its first two direct child elements in a horizontal or vertical orientation that distributes the available page real estate. When resizable, it provides a pointer and keyboard accessible affordance for users to customize distribution.

attributes.name: collapsible
attributes.description: Whether panels can be collapsed completely

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Accessible label for the resizable divider

attributes.name: primary-max
attributes.description: The maximum size of the primary pane (in pixels)

attributes.name: primary-min
attributes.description: The minimum size of the primary pane (in pixels)

attributes.name: primary-size
attributes.description: The initial size of the primary pane (in pixels or percentage)

attributes.name: resizable
attributes.description: Whether the split view can be resized by the user

attributes.name: secondary-max
attributes.description: The maximum size of the secondary pane (in pixels)

attributes.name: secondary-min
attributes.description: The minimum size of the secondary pane (in pixels)

attributes.name: vertical
attributes.description: Whether the split view is arranged vertically

slots.name: primary-panel
slots.description: Two sibling elements to be sized by the element attributes

slots.name: secondary-panel
slots.description: Two sibling elements to be sized by the element attributes

events.name: change
events.description: Announces the new position of the splitter

keyboardInteractions.description: Resize the panels when the splitter has focus
Move to minimum or maximum size
